Header: New Director at Army HR & IHL Wing Assumes Office
Content: Brigadier P.A Dharmasri Kahapola assumed office as the new Director for the Directorate of Human Rights and International Humanitarian Law (HR & IHL) on Thursday (10) during a simple ceremony amidst religious observances. He is the 19th Director for this wing of the Army. After signing a formal document, he symbolized the acceptance of the new office. Before this appointment, he was the Commandant, Combat Training School (CTS), Ampara. Staff Officers and Other Ranks of the Directorate attended this occasion.
